node_property_query: CALL apoc.meta.data() YIELD label, other, elementType, type, property WHERE NOT type = 'RELATIONSHIP' AND elementType = 'node' WITH label AS nodeLabels, collect(property) AS properties RETURN {labels: nodeLabels, properties: properties} AS output
edge_property_query: CALL apoc.meta.data() YIELD label, other, elementType, type, property WHERE NOT type = 'RELATIONSHIP' AND elementType = 'relationship' WITH label AS nodeLabels, collect(property) AS properties RETURN {type: nodeLabels, properties: properties} AS output
node_edge_relationship_query: CALL apoc.meta.data() YIELD label, other, elementType, type, property WHERE type = 'RELATIONSHIP' AND elementType = 'node' RETURN {source: label, relationship: property, target: other} AS output
